products_entries.full_product_description: Supply, erection, testing and commissioning of GI "C" Class(Heavy Class)  pipes conforming to IS 1239 with threaded or grooved fittings with  including cutting  pipes to correct lengths, providing fittings like elbow,tee,reducer and welding flanges to pipe, fixing with clamps to MS brackets / hangers, steel supports as per drawing.  Rate shall be inclusive of Zinc chromate primer over that 2 coats red enamel paint as per Fire authorities requirement over all above ground pies. Rates to be inclusive of  all complete as per specifications a | 150 NB
products_entries.feature_or_specifications: class: c class (heavy class), standard: indian standard 1239, fittings: threaded or grooved, fittings included: elbow, tee, reducer, welding flanges, fixing: clamps to ms brackets / hangers, steel supports, primer: zinc chromate, paint: 2 coats red enamel, requirement: fire authorities, application: above ground pipes
